hero.name: Mohammed Nedal
hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: I craft dynamic, user-friendly web applications using modern technologies. Passionate about creating scalable solutions that make a difference.

projects.title: JoCom Customer Feedback System
projects.description: A comprehensive interactive customer feedback system developed during my tenure at JoCom company. The system features an intuitive client interface with emoji-based satisfaction ratings (Dissatisfied, Neutral, Satisfied) and dynamic question forms that adapt based on user responses. Includes a complete admin portal for managing feedback questions, analyzing responses, and generating reports. Built to enhance customer experience evaluation and provide valuable insights for business improvement.
